tag_list: home, improvement, remodeling, bid, management, leads, jobs, contractors, handyman, homeowner, classifieds, projects, repair, commercial, building, designer, additions, plumbing, electrical, hvac, roofing, flooring, tile, carpet, cabinets
overview: Bidjobber.com represents a breakthrough for general and sub-contractors, giving them a powerful set of tools to facilitate the bid management process, find new work, and ensure the best possible service for the best possible price. Search through jobs, post to classifieds, network with others, all from the convenience of your computer.
